name: Verify the filteration of feedbacks

steps.name: Given  the base_uri of the application
When  the user sends the get request to "/locations/LOC001/feedbacks?type=CUISINE_EXPERIENCE&sort=date,desc" request payload
Then  the status code should be 200
And  the response should validate the "ValidateFeedbacks" schema
